reviewText: Recommended if you are a fan of the series, or Kimmel.
Arrived before estimated time. A great comedy show remember watching this on the comedy in Australia. Still very funny for its comedy skits!.
Works & runs just fine.  This will be a nice addition to my MAN CAVE.  What better DVD to have for it's intended purpose.
Adam and Jimmy were great together in this series, which showed which sex is the lowest of the low. Funny
Great product, the service was right on time and I greatly appreciated how the product was as it was advertised
Good quality, complete season, great special features. I highly recommend to anyone that finds the most offensive ideas out there to be Politically Correct ideas.
this is a great show..was glad I bought it.got while I was on duty in Egypt..My fellow soldiers also enjoyed watching the show..
Not for women. This is guy stuff. There is some really funny material here and of course, the Juggies! Maybe not all men will appreciate The Man Show, but MOST will. Kimel is GREAT.

First, before anybody gets offended, remember when watching this show you have to suspend disbelief.  It's so full of it and over the top it's hillarious.  At times it can be a little brief, a few episodes are just a couple of skits and some boring filler, but for the most part there was at least one or two really good laughs per episode and at this price, that's pretty darn good.

You can read other reviews for what the show is about, but the short version is it's a guy's fantasy land where the hosts get to do pranks and tell jokes while chugging drinks.  It's just a genuinely fun program.  Too bad Joe "Fear Factor" Rogan and some other dim commedian were the ones to take up the reigns a couple seasons later.  Seasons 1-4 were just lighthearted fun, but after those two got a hold of it it became just plain gross and disgusting.  I'd highly recommend this set.  Even my wife liked the show and she barely likes anything I watch.

The Man Show is, by far, the greatest show ever to grace the face of television.  Its perfect balance of fart humor and bouncing, well-endowed girls is the perfect match for any dinner party.  If you thought Mary Tyler Moore was a great show, just wait until you see The Man Show.
Other than the trampoline stuff, this show wasn't as funny as I remember.
Very great season of the Man Show!  Every episode was awesome!
Got it fast, and it's exactly what I wanted
Wish there was more. 4 seasons is not enough of this awesome show.
It's the man show... what can I say?  :)
